response.overview: X-Treme Evermore MTB DVD: See It: World class riders at unique locations in Europe and the Indian Ocean. Extraordinary close up shots and epic landscapes. Hear It: The sound of nature and the terrain beneath the tyres. The rider and his equipment up close and during the action. Multi channel surround sound design.Feel It: The impacts on the rider and his equipment. Get closer to mountain biking than ever before. After Roam, Super 8, Clorophilla And Earthed Europa, Here's the biggest European title to hit the shelves this year.
response.title: Evermore
